commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
from django_filters import rest_framework as filters
from .models import Inquires

class InquiresFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    project_service = filters.NumberFilter(field_name='project_service__id', lookup_expr='exact')
    project_plan = filters.NumberFilter(field_name='project_plan__id', lookup_expr='exact')
    created_at = filters.DateFromToRangeFilter(field_name='created_at')

    class Meta:
        model = Inquires
        fields = ['project_service', 'project_plan', 'created_at']
